WRITING.TEXT: The number next to your name is for link karma. It has nothing to do with how many links you have posted, it is the total amount of times that others Redditors have clicked the "Up" arrow to the left of your link. If one of your links has 5 upvotes, 5 more Redditors have "Liked" your post than have downvoted or "Unliked" it. Each subreddit has it's own rule rules about posting. The more karma you have, the less restrictions there will be on how much you can post, that's why redditors post cat pics and stuff, to build up cheap and easy karma.
